column5: AM GOING UP ON THE 17TH, DOES ANYBODY HAVE CURRENT ICE CONDITIONS OR HAVE ANY INSIGHT AS TO WHEN LAKE WILL BE ICE FREE? ANY AND ALL ANSWERS APPRECIATED. I THINK I HAVE ROOM TO PACK AN ICE BREAKER IF NEEDED. ;) THANKS
HEY, YOU NON-FISH CATCHIN ELECTRICIAN, ICE WILL BE ABOUT 4' THICK STILL. YOU MIGHT WANT TO CONSIDER STAYING HOME AND DROWNING YOURSELF IN SOME BEERS. THANKS FOR THE BRAIN BUCKET. C - U - BI!!!!
I go up to Sturgeon for the opener also. If I hear anything I will post but it doesn't look good.
From what I have heard and people I've talked to, it WILL be open. Have a great time and good luck
That the ice would be out. Open 30" from shoreline and very black. All that is needed is a good strong wind with a little rain and ice is GOOD-BYE!!!!
People who run our camp say ice will not be off lake for opener. White sand area possibly but not main lake.

I'm still trying to figure out why he is posting on a Walleye site when all he catches is Northerns and Canada. I'm waiting for word on that Ice Out too. From pictures in Souix Lookout I think we'll have enough open water to fish the bay at Trappers Point but may not get into the big lake for a few day's. Just as well, later ice out should have more fish still in the bay's..
